text: Poniatów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-west of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital of Wrocław. The village has a population of 3. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Poniatów, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
